sentences.sentence: Chin-Hui was a late-season call-up to the majors.
sentences.translation: 清辉在赛季后期被选入美国职业棒球大联盟。

sentences.sentence: The Hui people live in more central China, close to the north.
sentences.translation: 回族人生活在华中地区，靠近北方。

sentences.sentence: As for her future, Yang Hui said, "I hope to stand up and walk one day after operations."
sentences.translation: 至于她的未来，杨慧说：“我希望术后有一天能站起来走路。”
